## Overview

hurdat-hadisst-data is a unified data sets that summarises the relevant variables (for my Master's Thesis) of each analysed tropical-cyclone using data from the HURDAT2 and the HadISST1.

The basins analysed are the North Atlantic Ocean and the Northeast Pacific Ocean.
